title: Manage a Project Budget Transfer
description: The civil engineering work package is trending under budget, and the project manager wants to transfer some of its budget to the mechanical work package, which is over budget.

tasks.description: Check the current budget and actual costs for both the civil and mechanical WBS elements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that civil has a positive cost variance and mechanical has a negative one.

tasks.description: Create a budget transfer request in the cost management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates a new budget transfer.

tasks.description: Enter the amount to transfer, the 'from' WBS (civil), and the 'to' WBS (mechanical), then submit for approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the transfer, which reallocates the budget between the two cost centers.
